statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSWAFClassicWebACL)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSWAFClassicWebACL)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (n:AWSWAFv2WebACL)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AWSWAFv2WebACL)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:AWSOrganization{id: $ORGANIZATION_ID})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: $WORKSPACE_ID}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) RETURN COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
